Sentencas: The mixed ionic and electronic oxide LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-delta (LNF) is a promising ceramic cathode material for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Determination of Kinetic Parameters and Identification of the Rate-Determining Steps in the Oxygen Exchange Process for LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-d

Sentencas: Since the reaction rate of oxygen interaction with the cathode material is extremely important, the present work considers the oxygen exchange mechanism between O-2 and LNF oxide.
Titulo: Determination of Kinetic Parameters and Identification of the Rate-Determining Steps in the Oxygen Exchange Process for LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-d

Sentencas: The kinetic dependence of the oxygen/oxide interaction has been determined by two isotopic methods using O-18-labelled oxygen.
Titulo: Determination of Kinetic Parameters and Identification of the Rate-Determining Steps in the Oxygen Exchange Process for LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-d

Sentencas: The application of the isotope exchange with the gas phase equilibrium (IE-GPE) and the pulsed isotope exchange (PIE) has provided information over a wide range of temperatures (350-800 degrees C) and oxygen pressures (10-200 mbar), as each method has different applicability limits.
Titulo: Determination of Kinetic Parameters and Identification of the Rate-Determining Steps in the Oxygen Exchange Process for LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-d

Sentencas: Applying mathematical models to treat the kinetic relationships, the oxygen exchange rate (rH, atom mu cm(-2) x s(-1)) and the diffusion coefficient (D, cm(2)/s) were calculated.
Titulo: Determination of Kinetic Parameters and Identification of the Rate-Determining Steps in the Oxygen Exchange Process for LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-d

Sentencas: The values of rH and D depend on both temperature and oxygen pressure.
Titulo: Determination of Kinetic Parameters and Identification of the Rate-Determining Steps in the Oxygen Exchange Process for LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-d

Sentencas: The activation energy of the surface exchange rate is 0.73 +/- 0.05 eV for the PIE method at 200 mbar, and 0.48 +/- 0.02 eV for the IE-GPE method at 10-20 mbar; for the diffusion coefficient, the activation energy equals 0.62 +/- 0.01 eV at 10-20 mbar for the IE-GPE method.
Titulo: Determination of Kinetic Parameters and Identification of the Rate-Determining Steps in the Oxygen Exchange Process for LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-d

Sentencas: Differences in the mechanism of oxygen exchange and diffusion on dense and powder samples are observed due to the different microstructure and surface morphology of the samples.
Titulo: Determination of Kinetic Parameters and Identification of the Rate-Determining Steps in the Oxygen Exchange Process for LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-d

Sentencas: The influence of oxygen pressure on the ratio of contributions of different exchange types to the total oxygen exchange rate is demonstrated.
Titulo: Determination of Kinetic Parameters and Identification of the Rate-Determining Steps in the Oxygen Exchange Process for LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-d

Sentencas: For the first time, the rate-determining step in the oxygen exchange process for LNF material has been identified.
Titulo: Determination of Kinetic Parameters and Identification of the Rate-Determining Steps in the Oxygen Exchange Process for LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-d

Sentencas: This paper discusses the reasons for the difference in the mechanisms of oxygen exchange and diffusion.
Titulo: Determination of Kinetic Parameters and Identification of the Rate-Determining Steps in the Oxygen Exchange Process for LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-d
